name: Space Chase (Wise-394)
description:
This game is made for 8 bits to infinity game jam with the theme of "chase" and challenge of making a game that is playable only with mouse

Space Chase is a spaceship 2D shooting game that will test your skills and reflexes! In this fast-paced adventure, you must take control of your spacecraft and navigate through space, battling waves of enemy ships that are out to get you.

-you have limited ammo and fuel, so you must use them wisely in order to survive

-With each kill, you'll earn ammo, so make sure to aim carefully and take out as many enemies as possible.

CONTROLS

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON-shoot bullet

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - booster
